title: Fully Renovated, Heated Pool, Central A/C, 24 Hr. Gym, Quiet Area...
posting_body: ['The Howard', '611 N Howard St, Glendale, CA, 91206', 'Call Now -', 'show contact info', 'x 66', 'OR Text', '66', 'to', 'show contact info', 'to contact our team.', 'Want more information?', 'Follow this link:', '<URL>', 'Glendale Apartments', 'This is a 2 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 972 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Welcome home to The Howard!', 'Where exceptional living meets convenience.', 'Perfectly situated near the center of Glendale, you will enjoy a variety of shopping and dining choices.', 'Even closer to home, you will experience a state-of-the-art fitness facility and a beautiful clubhouse and recreation room.', 'Our spacious floor plans offer a unique quality and comfort unmatched by our neighbors.', "Love coming home to The Howard, Glendale's premier apartments!", 'Pricing and availability are subject to change.', 'Please contact our leasing office for current pricing and specials.', 'Pet Policy', 'We are cat and Dog friendly!!', '<3', 'There is an additional $65.00 a month for dogs and $35.00 for cats added to your rent.', 'And an additional $500.00 pet security deposit/ per pet required.', 'Income Requirements:', '3x rent', 'Office Hours:', '9:00AM to 6:00PM Monday- Sunday.', 'Office closed From: 1:00PM to 2:00PM Daily for lunch', 'Photos displayed are a representation of the community but may not be of the exact apartment.', 'Availability and rental rates are updated daily, and conditions are subject to change without notice.', 'Please contact the property for current availability and pricing.', 'kZ1dDp1yPHt']
